title: Streaking - Powerfresh Pet Lift-Off Steam Mop
description:
Clean with the natural power of steam both on and above your floors
The BISSELL®PowerFresh® Lift-Off® Steam Mop Pet gives you a more versatile, natural steam cleaning of your home on a wide range of surfaces.  When use as directed, it eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria using only water and the washable pad for a natural clean.  Its Lift-Off POD and 13 specialized tools allow you to clean surfaces above your floors, including counters, sinks, grout, and windows.  The exclusive flip-down EasyScrubber™ makes it easy to remove tough, sticky pet messes from your floors. Scent discs help to remove pet odors while you clean and leave behind a delightful scent.

    When used as directed, eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria* using only water for a natural clean. *When using the microfiber cloth pad, use as directed, results may vary.
    The Lift-Off POD allows for above-the-floor steam cleaning.
    It includes multiple cleaning attachments for cleaning on a variety of surfaces above your floors including appliances, counter tops, windows, grout, and hardware.
    The flip down EasyScrubber™ on the back of the foot makes removing tough, sticky messes on your floor simple and easy.

http://www.bissell.com/powerfresh-pet-lift-off-steam-mop-15441

transcripts: Before using, always make sure to thoroughly sweep or vacuum your floors. Also, make sure that your pad is clean. You can wash the pads with a mild detergent in your washing machine but don't use fabric softener or bleach. If there is an odd looking substance on the pad, the streaking is likely being caused by dirt or residual cleaning products. If you have used floor polishers or wax space cleaners on your floors, steam products may decrease the glossiness. Refer to the wax or polish manufacturer for removal. If you don't wax or polish your floors, check the floor care instructions from your foreign manufacturer.
